snippet: There has been no claim of responsibility, but the Nigerian Islamist militant groups Boko Haram and Ansaru are known to operate in the region, near the border with Nigeria.
abstract: French government says French priest Georges Vandenbeusch was abducted from a monastery in far north of Cameroon; no one has claimed responsibility, but Nigerian Islamist militant groups Boko Haram and Ansaru are known to operate in the region.
lead_paragraph: There has been no claim of responsibility, but the Nigerian Islamist militant groups Boko Haram and Ansaru are known to operate in the region, near the border with Nigeria.

keywords.value: Ansaru (Vanguard for the Protection of Muslims in Black Africa)
keywords.name: organizations
